# Maintenance and Support Services Contract

## Tender Details
**Solicitation Number**: APN_TT24FM01
**Publication Date**: 2023-01-13
**Tender Closing Date**: 2023-02-22T13:00:00
**Contracting Entity Name**: Defence Construction Canada
**Contracting Entity Address**: Constitution Square, 19th Floor, 350 Albert Street, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0K3, Canada

## Project Description
Advance Procurement Notice: Maintenance and Support Services Contract for Toronto, Greater Toronto Area, Southwestern and Northern Ontario.

This is a notice to provide interested Facility Maintenance Contractors an opportunity to begin the sponsorship request process for obtaining the required security clearance(s) for a potential Maintenance Services Contract.

## Project Scope
The Maintenance Services Contract will require multi-trade and single-trade contractors to provide facilities management and maintenance services for approximately 48 sites under RPOps (O) Section Toronto. The buildings are located in the Greater Toronto Area, Southwestern Ontario, and Northeastern Ontario (North Bay, Timmins, Sudbury, Sault Saint Marie, etc.).

## Contract Requirements
The Contract will consist of facilities management and maintenance services including inspection, testing, maintenance, preventative maintenance, and repairs of equipment and systems, such as:

* Building Envelope Maintenance
* Electrical Systems
* Elevator and Lifting Systems
* Fire Detection and Suppression Systems
* Generator
* Heating, Ventilation, Air Conditioning & Refrigeration Systems
* Plumbing Systems
* Cleaning and Housekeeping Services
* Integrated Pest Management Services
* Landscaping Services
* Snow and Ice Clearing Services
* Solid Waste Management
* Life Safety Systems Inspections

## Security Requirements
Contractors must actively hold a valid and active Facility Security Clearance (FSC) at the level of SECRET granted or approved by the Contract Security Program (CSP) of Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC).

## Sponsorship Process
Defence Construction Canada (DCC) offers preliminary assistance with the security clearance sponsorship process. Contractors can submit a sponsorship request application to DCC by following the steps on their website at [https://www.dcc-cdc.gc.ca/industry/security-requirements](https://www.dcc-cdc.gc.ca/industry/security-requirements).

## Contract Award and Timeline
The Contract Award is contingent on the approval to proceed by the Department of National Defence (DND). The procurement process is expected to start in May 2023.
